articles.description: This Women's Day we ask five of India's pre-eminent sportswomen on the biggest challenge they faced growing up as a woman athlete, and the change they would like to see.
articles.content: Women's Day is an opportunity to look past the tokenism and evaluate how far Indian sport has come in the effort to make it a truly level playing field. Here we get the views of five of India's pre-e… [+6842 chars]

articles.author: Rob Dawson
articles.title: Ten Hag must rebuild Man United squad where Solskjaer failed - ESPN India
articles.description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer was unable to overhaul the squad like he wanted as Man United boss. Can Erik ten Hag complete the job his predecessor couldn't?
articles.content:
It was after a 4-0 defeat at Everton in April 2019 that Ole Gunnar Solskjaer suggested it was the end of the road for some of the Manchester United players he had inherited from Jose Mourinho.
Appoi… [+4761 chars]

articles.title: Ticket sales for India vs Australia ODI match in Vizag to commence on 10 March - Yo Vizag
articles.description: The ACA commenced the preparations to host India vs Australia ODI match in Vizag on 19 March 2023 at Dr YSR ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium
articles.content: The Andhra Cricket Association (ACA) commenced the preparations to host India vs Australia ODI match in Vizag on 19 March 2023 at Dr YSR ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium. The entry gates will be open to the … [+1311 chars]

articles.title: Shoaib Malik's absence from Sania Mirza's felicitation ceremony reignites divorce rumours, netizens say ‘Woh bas Twitter pe hi congratulate karte hai’ - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Sania Mirza who recently announced retirement from Tennis after a 20-year long career has also been in the headlines for her rumoured divorce with husband Shoaib Malik. Several celebs from sports and entertainment industry attended her farewell event recently…
